GameConsole.Model.Domain

类 Continent

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameConsole.Model.Domain.Continent

  • public class Continent
extends java.lang.Object
    This class create methods to add/remove countries to Continents, get/set Continents bonus and so on the toString method lists the countries on the continent.

    • 构造器概要

      constructor method with incoming parameters.
      Continent(java.lang.String color, java.lang.String name, int bonus, World world)
      Construction method with incoming parameters.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Continent

        public Continent(java.lang.String color,
                 java.lang.String name,
                 int bonus,
                 World world)
        Construction method with incoming parameters.
        参数:
        color - the continent color with Color type
        name - continent name with String type
        bonus - a bonus the player can get after conquest the continent
        world - the world the players are in

      • Continent

        public Continent(int bonus,
                 java.lang.String name)
        constructor method with incoming parameters.
        参数:
        bonus - a continent's bonus after conquest it
        name - continent name with String type

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        To get the country list in String layout
        覆盖:
        toString 在类中 java.lang.Object
        返回:
        the list of countries' name with String type
